types:type.name: taxInfo
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type taxInfo = {| driverLicenseId: String, name: String, taxFileNumber: String, taxRecordId: String, grossIncome: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalTaxPaid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, remainingTaxDue: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"driverLicenseId\\\":\\\"123456\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"John Wick\\\",\\\"taxFileNumber\\\":\\\"TFN987654321\\\",\\\"taxRecordId\\\":\\\"TR123456\\\",\\\"grossIncome\\\":75000,\\\"totalTaxPaid\\\":15000,\\\"remainingTaxDue\\\":5000}"}

types:type.name: taxRecord
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type taxRecord = {| taxRecordId: String, grossIncome: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalTaxPaid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, remainingTaxDue: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"taxRecordId\\\":\\\"TR123456\\\",\\\"grossIncome\\\":75000,\\\"totalTaxPaid\\\":15000,\\\"remainingTaxDue\\\":5000}"}

types:type.name: employeeInfo
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type employeeInfo = {| driverLicenseId: String, email: String |} {"example": "{\\\"driverLicenseId\\\":\\\"123456\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"john.wick@example.com\\\"}"}

types:type.name: insurance
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type insurance = {| "_id": String, driverLicenseId: String, insurancePlan: String, expiryDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"_id\\\":\\\"66f4c3cdad86920734402693\\\",\\\"driverLicenseId\\\":\\\"123456\\\",\\\"insurancePlan\\\":\\\"Premium Health Plan\\\",\\\"expiryDate\\\":\\\"2025-12-31\\\"}"}

types:type.name: allTaxInfo
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type allTaxInfo = {| driverLicenseId: String, name: String, taxFileNumber: String, taxRecordId: String, grossIncome: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalTaxPaid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, remainingTaxDue: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"driverLicenseId\\\":\\\"123456\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"John Wick\\\",\\\"taxFileNumber\\\":\\\"TFN987654321\\\",\\\"taxRecordId\\\":\\\"TR123456\\\",\\\"grossIncome\\\":75000,\\\"totalTaxPaid\\\":15000,\\\"remainingTaxDue\\\":5000}"}
